about_the_game:
The evocative Beyond the Sky Original Soundtrack. All tracks are delivered in MP3 and FLAC formats.

01. Selene's Theme
02. Moon's Child
03. Ember Eyes Through the Dark Woods
04. Lore
05. Gates to Nowhere
06. Lost in the Mist
07. Memories of Lost Souls
08. A Deadly Game
09. The House in the Heart of the Forest
10. The Beast
11. Beyond the Sky

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 1 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Video Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
